631.question: Why did they think this was a good idea?
631.response: {'Answer': 'They thought this was a good idea because the model is built on a seq2seq model with an attention mechanism, and they added a coverage mechanism to reduce repetition. The coverage mechanism was supported by ablation results showing its effectiveness. Professional evaluations also showed strong agreement, indicating the model's accuracy in generating prescriptions.'}
631.answer: They think it will help human TCM practitioners make prescriptions.
